html:
11.4.20  1:46 am   I noticed you answer questions almost all day.

      How much sleep are you getting?
11.4.20  1:40 am   how do i start making music

11.4.20  12:55 am   When you make your art, do you do it because you love it,

      or do you feel a sense of responsibility and urgency to create it.

     Almost like it needs to be manifested in reality for the sake of it,

     not because people are waiting for you to do it.

     I've dabbled in videography and music composition, but I've never been able to be consistent with it. I mean I like it, don't get me wrong, but I don't have this fervor to create. Do you experience this fervor

      and if so, where does it come from?
11.4.20  12:55 am   Thoughts on the ocean?
11.4.20  12:53 am   thoughts on politics?
11.4.20  12:49 am   how to deal with anxiety?
11.3.20  11:25 pm   do you ever thank inanimate objects for doing a good job

11.3.20  9:58 pm   why don't the things I see make sense anymore?

     They used to have some semblance of reason, but now it's just a bunch of dumb shit I could write whole essays about, but now there's just too much confusion to deal with, what do I do??
11.3.20  9:44 pm   how do you make your videos?
11.3.20  8:43 pm   hey, what do you consider the category for your music?
11.3.20  8:41 pm   What continually keeps you excited about music??
11.3.20  7:14 pm   what is normal?
11.3.20  6:56 pm   what would be an inspiration that came out of nowhere?
11.3.20  5:58 pm   has anyone told you that your music videos aren't just videos to accompany the music but rather a visual form of the music itself?
11.3.20  5:27 pm   Why do you use bright colors in your videos?

11.3.20  4:55 pm   Hey Bill, I'm learning music theory and we're supposed to memorize intervals, but I can't find a way to help me remember the minor 7th. I don't know any songs that sound like that and it's very weird sounding. I could just remember it being "that one I don't know,"  but I'd prefer a more practical method of remembering it. Any tips?
11.3.20  3:31 pm   How long do you think it will take for your next video?

11.3.20  1:54 pm   Are you still making songs?

     Also can I become a guitar?
11.3.20  1:18 pm   how far along are you with the video?
11.3.20  12:50 pm   How did the duck that asked "steve" (in the hi im steve video) "how did you climb that mountain?" If the duck had to get up the mountain to give "steve" the letter?????
11.3.20  11:32 am   What is your opinion on water?
11.3.20  11:21 am   I'm in a musical/creative rut right now. Tips on how to get out of it?
11.3.20  11:14 am   Are you making a video right now?
11.3.20  11:00 am   which animal is your most favorite?

11.3.20  10:47 am   i want to learn songs i like in order to make songs (instrumentals) i like more. how do you learn a song? do you re-create it with your computer? do you learn to play all the parts on your instruments? do you transcribe it? something else?

     thanks for reading, and for answering if you do
11.3.20  10:26 am   Can you do any impressions?
11.3.20  10:16 am   What is the exact day you will make your next video

11.3.20  10:11 am   what inspired you to make videos?

     also love your videos
11.3.20  10:00 am   is writing the most important thing to do in order to organize my ideas and figure out what i want and is there any other way
11.3.20  9:58 am   What is your opinion on earthworms?
11.3.20  9:49 am   Why do fruits exist?
11.3.20  9:44 am   do you think history textbooks depict historical events accurately
11.3.20  9:42 am   Do you still use anything you learned in Middle School/Junior High?
11.3.20  9:41 am   Are u actually trying to learn 3D animation?

11.3.20  9:11 am   Who or what is your inspiration when it comes to writing music?

     Is it everything you see in general then you apply your experiences and let it flow like water?

      I'm often told that music is free and I've always took my grandpa's words that "music is a vessel that can only shine when you put your soul in it". And I believe that your works, they are made with your own soul. I believe that you've put yourself into those. Here's my last question: I've forgotten how to play guitar by now and my voice is now coarse. Do you think I'll be able to come back to music again?
11.3.20  8:33 am   Do you prefer making songs or random videos like hi im steve?

11.3.20  8:22 am   I wonder how do you come up with lyrics for your songs

     and which song was the most difficult to make

11.3.20  8:04 am   Can you end covid please?

      Thanks
11.3.20  8:00 am   When r u making a video again?

11.3.20  7:34 am   Did the Mechanical Pencil from "a Play featuring an iphone power block and a mechanical pencil" vote in the next election?
